sentences.sContent: Oscars organizers have already confirmed one change by announcing Australian actor Hugh Jackman as the host of the show, a departure from the recent tradition of popular comedians acting as  compere.
sentences.sContent_eng: Oscars organizers have already confirmed one change by announcing Australian actor Hugh Jackman as the host of the show, a departure from the recent tradition of popular comedians acting as compere.
sentences.sCn: 奥斯卡的主办者已经证实了一项改变，就是这次的主持将由澳大利亚人休·杰克曼担任。 以往都是由知名的喜剧演员担任这一职务的。

trans.tranOther: someone who introduces the people who are performing in a television programme, theatre show etc
